summary: "Contact" is a 1997 science fiction movie directed by Robert Zemeckis, based on Carl Sagan's book. Jodie Foster plays Dr. Ellie Arroway, a scientist who discovers proof of alien life. She's chosen to make first contact. The film also stars Matthew McConaughey and James Woods. It was a big success, making over $171 million and winning many awards. Sagan and his wife Ann Druyan started working on it in 1979, and it took almost 20 years to make.
title: Contact (1997 American film)
